description: Suggest provides intelligent predictions or recommendations based on the user's input or context, such as relevant places, points of interest, query terms or search category. It is designed to help users find places or point of interests candidates or identify a follow on query based on incomplete or misspelled queries. It returns a list of possible matches or refinements that can be used to formulate a more accurate query. Users can select the most appropriate suggestion and use it for further searching. The API provides options for filtering results by location and other attributes, and allows for additional features like phonemes and timezones. The response includes refined query terms and detailed place information.

parameters.name: QueryText
parameters.description: The free-form text query to match addresses against. This is usually a partially typed address from an end user in an address box or form.

parameters.name: BiasPosition
parameters.description: The position, in longitude and latitude, that the results should be close to. Typically, place results returned are ranked higher the closer they are to this position. Stored in [lng, lat] and in the WSG84 format. (float) ---

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: A structure which contains a set of inclusion/exclusion properties that results must possess in order to be returned as a result. BoundingBox (list) --- The bounding box enclosing the geometric shape (area or line) that an individual result covers. The bounding box formed is defined as a set 4 coordinates: [{westward lng}, {southern lat}, {eastward lng}, {northern lat}] (float) --- Circle (dict) --- The Circle that all results must be in. The center position, in longitude and latitude, of the FilterCircle. (float) --- The radius, in meters, of the FilterCircle. IncludeCountries (list) --- A list of countries that all results must be in. Countries are represented by either their alpha-2 or alpha-3 character codes. (string) ---

nested_params.name: BoundingBox
nested_params.description: The bounding box enclosing the geometric shape (area or line) that an individual result covers. The bounding box formed is defined as a set 4 coordinates: [{westward lng}, {southern lat}, {eastward lng}, {northern lat}]

nested_params.name: Circle
nested_params.description: The Circle that all results must be in.

nested_params.name: Center
nested_params.description: The center position, in longitude and latitude, of the FilterCircle.

nested_params.name: Radius
nested_params.description: The radius, in meters, of the FilterCircle.

nested_params.name: IncludeCountries
nested_params.description: A list of countries that all results must be in. Countries are represented by either their alpha-2 or alpha-3 character codes.

parameters.name: AdditionalFeatures
parameters.description: A list of optional additional parameters, such as time zone, that can be requested for each result. (string) ---

nested_items.name: PricingBucket
nested_items.description: The pricing bucket for which the query is charged at.

nested_items.name: ResultItems
nested_items.description: List of places or results returned for a query.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The display title that should be used when presenting this option to the end user.

nested_items.name: SuggestResultItemType
nested_items.description: The result type. Place results represent the final result for a point of interest, Query results represent a follow up query which can be completed through the SearchText operation.

nested_items.name: PlaceId
nested_items.description: The PlaceId of the place you wish to receive the information for.

nested_items.name: PlaceType
nested_items.description: A PlaceType is a category that the result place must belong to.

nested_items.name: Label
nested_items.description: Assembled address value built out of the address components, according to the regional postal rules. This is the correctly formatted address.

nested_items.name: Code2
nested_items.description: Country, represented by its alpha 2-character code.

nested_items.name: Code3
nested_items.description: Country, represented by its alpha t-character code.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the country.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: Abbreviated code for a the state, province or region of the country.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name for a the state, province, or region of the country.

nested_items.name: SubRegion
nested_items.description: The sub-region or county for which results should be present in.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: Abbreviated code for the county or sub-region.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name for the county or sub-region.

nested_items.name: Locality
nested_items.description: The city or locality of the address.

nested_items.name: District
nested_items.description: The district or division of a locality associated with this address.

nested_items.name: SubDistrict
nested_items.description: A subdivision of a district.

nested_items.name: PostalCode
nested_items.description: An alphanumeric string included in a postal address to facilitate mail sorting, such as post code, postcode, or ZIP code, for which the result should possess.

nested_items.name: Block
nested_items.description: Name of the block.

nested_items.name: SubBlock
nested_items.description: Name of sub-block.

nested_items.name: Intersection
nested_items.description: Name of the streets in the intersection.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Street
nested_items.description: The name of the street results should be present in.

nested_items.name: StreetComponents
nested_items.description: Components of the street.

nested_items.name: BaseName
nested_items.description: Base name part of the street name.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Street type part of the street name.

nested_items.name: TypePlacement
nested_items.description: Defines if the street type is before or after the base name.

nested_items.name: TypeSeparator
nested_items.description: Defines a separator character such as "" or " " between the base name and type.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: A prefix is a directional identifier that precedes, but is not included in, the base name of a road.

nested_items.name: Suffix
nested_items.description: A suffix is a directional identifier that follows, but is not included in, the base name of a road.

nested_items.name: Direction
nested_items.description: Indicates the official directional identifiers assigned to highways.

nested_items.name: Language
nested_items.description: A BCP 47 compliant language codes for the results to be rendered in. If there is no data for the result in the requested language, data will be returned in the default language for the entry.

nested_items.name: AddressNumber
nested_items.description: The number that identifies an address within a street.

nested_items.name: Building
nested_items.description: The name of the building at the address.

nested_items.name: SecondaryAddressComponents
nested_items.description: Components that correspond to secondary identifiers on an Address. Secondary address components include information such as Suite or Unit Number, Building, or Floor.

nested_items.name: Number
nested_items.description: Number that uniquely identifies a secondary address.

nested_items.name: Position
nested_items.description: The position, in longitude and latitude.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: Distance
nested_items.description: The distance in meters from the QueryPosition.

nested_items.name: MapView
nested_items.description: The bounding box enclosing the geometric shape (area or line) that an individual result covers.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: Categories
nested_items.description: Categories of results that results must belong to.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The category ID.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The category name.

nested_items.name: LocalizedName
nested_items.description: Localized name of the category type.

nested_items.name: Primary
nested_items.description: Boolean which indicates if this category is the primary offered by the place.

nested_items.name: FoodTypes
nested_items.description: List of food types offered by this result.

nested_items.name: LocalizedName
nested_items.description: Localized name of the food type.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The Food Type Id.

nested_items.name: Primary
nested_items.description: Boolean which indicates if this food type is the primary offered by the place. For example, if a location serves fast food, but also dessert, he primary would likely be fast food.

nested_items.name: BusinessChains
nested_items.description: The Business Chains associated with the place.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The business chain name.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The Business Chain Id.

nested_items.name: AccessPoints
nested_items.description: Position of the access point represent by longitude and latitude.

nested_items.name: Position
nested_items.description: The position, in longitude and latitude.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: AccessRestrictions
nested_items.description: Indicates known access restrictions on a vehicle access point. The index correlates to an access point and indicates if access through this point has some form of restriction.

nested_items.name: Restricted
nested_items.description: The restriction.

nested_items.name: Categories
nested_items.description: Categories of results that results must belong too.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The category ID.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The category name.

nested_items.name: LocalizedName
nested_items.description: Localized name of the category type.

nested_items.name: Primary
nested_items.description: Boolean which indicates if this category is the primary offered by the place.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The time zone name.

nested_items.name: Offset
nested_items.description: Time zone offset of the timezone from UTC.

nested_items.name: OffsetSeconds
nested_items.description: The offset of the time zone from UTC, in seconds.

nested_items.name: PoliticalView
nested_items.description: The alpha-2 or alpha-3 character code for the political view of a country. The political view applies to the results of the request to represent unresolved territorial claims through the point of view of the specified country.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: List of PhonemeTranscription. See PhonemeTranscription for fields.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Value which indicates how to pronounce the value.

nested_items.name: Language
nested_items.description: A list of BCP 47 compliant language codes for the results to be rendered in. If there is no data for the result in the requested language, data will be returned in the default language for the entry.

nested_items.name: Preferred
nested_items.description: Boolean which indicates if it the preferred pronunciation.

nested_items.name: Country
nested_items.description: The alpha-2 or alpha-3 character code for the country that the results will be present in.

nested_items.name: Value

nested_items.name: Language

nested_items.name: QueryId
nested_items.description: QueryId can be used to complete a follow up query through the SearchText API. The QueryId retains context from the original Suggest request such as filters, political view and language. See the SearchText API documentation for more details SearchText API docs.

nested_items.name: QueryType
nested_items.description: The query type. Category queries will search for places which have an entry matching the given category, for example 'doctor office'. BusinessChain queries will search for instances of a given business.

nested_items.name: Highlights
nested_items.description: Describes how the parts of the response element matched the input query by returning the sections of the response which matched to input query terms.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: Indicates the starting and ending index of the title in the text query that match the found title.

nested_items.name: StartIndex
nested_items.description: Start index of the highlight.

nested_items.name: EndIndex
nested_items.description: End index of the highlight.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The highlight's value.

nested_items.name: Label
nested_items.description: Indicates the starting and ending indexes of the places in the result which were identified to match the textQuery. This result is useful for providing emphasis to results where the user query directly matched to make selecting the correct result from a list easier for an end user.

nested_items.name: StartIndex
nested_items.description: Start index of the highlight.

nested_items.name: EndIndex
nested_items.description: End index of the highlight.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The highlight's value.

nested_items.name: QueryRefinements
nested_items.description: Maximum number of query terms to be returned for use with a search text query.

nested_items.name: RefinedTerm
nested_items.description: The term that will be suggested to the user.

nested_items.name: OriginalTerm
nested_items.description: The sub-string of the original query that is replaced by this query term.

nested_items.name: StartIndex
nested_items.description: Start index of the parsed component.

nested_items.name: EndIndex
nested_items.description: End index of the parsed query.
